resources.string: If disabled,other users cannot find you via the above info.
After confirming your login password, set a 6-digit password for chat
The two chat passwords are inconsistent
Are you sure close lock screen password？
When on, you can\'t take screenshots or record screens in the app
Account cancellation is an irrecoverable operation. Please consider it carefully Before operation, be sure to read carefully and fully understand the following contents.
Account in safe state: \n your account has not been stolen by others, the account is not banned, and so on.
All property has been settled: \n there is no relevant property that has been recharged in the account.
Bind the currently available secure phone: \n confirm the identity of the current account.

Account cancellation application is to give up the account in the %s software all related data, including but not limited to the account is assets, rights and interests, records and other content, will be regarded as your voluntary release Abandon.
After successful logOff, you will not be able to log in.
The account that has been successfully cancelled cannot be retrieved.
Tap the "Cancel Account" button below to indicate that you have read and agreed
The network is disconnected. Please connect to the network
The password is wrong, and you can enter it again %d times
The existing unlock password will be cleared after confirmation. If you need to continue to use it, please reset it

Turning on the device lock can protect the %s account security. When you log in on an unverified device, you need to verify your mobile phone number, even if the password is leaked, others cannot log in.
Last login time：%s,are you to delete this device?
